short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expert rankings that automatically update as you draft.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gain an advantage in your fantasy football league with the Draft Guru chrome extension, which integrates expert advice from the Sneaky Athletic into your preferred league hosts and websites.

With this extension, you can access pick-by-pick advice, expert consensus rankings, news, and notes in your Yahoo, ESPN, or NFL.com fantasy draft room. You can also discover the latest information, advice, and news for any player, from any website, using the player name matching feature.
